item.title: CVE-2021-36720|2024-08-04T01:01:58.686Z -- cybonet -- pineapp%20-%20mail%20secure
item.description: PineApp - Mail Secure - Attacker sending a request to :/blocking.php?url=<script>alert(1)</script> and stealing cookies .

item.title: CVE-2021-36719|2024-08-04T01:01:58.939Z -- cybonet -- pineapp%20-%20mail%20secure
item.description: PineApp - Mail Secure - The attacker must be logged in as a user to the Pineapp system. The attacker exploits the vulnerable nicUpload.php file to upload a malicious file,Thus taking over the server and running remote code.
